name: Excellent Drawer
description:
Do you like to draw?, I hope you do.

In this game:

~You can draw (obv.)

~You can die (There are some spikes out there)

~You can try to collect coins (Simple, right?)

~Maybe you can look around( We have a beatiful white background :)) [By pressing shift + hovering the mouse over edges( We recommend doing this while standing still, you can pan around and also use  scrool wheel to zoom in-out )]

~Oh also, when you press space the man falls down! Beware and don't get killed! But when you press again you stop at the start, did I forget to say that?

Anyway, I guess that was all! You can always use "Escape" to escape  :P

Have fun!

BG music = Mittsies - Titanium

#BrackeysGameJam
